translations: Poor thing, whence will you fill this one with tears and this one with snot? Go bring yourself a pin of fine, beautiful water, put it here. Put a fingertip of salt in it, it will become snot

tokens.value: ‘Poor thing, whence will you fill this one with tears and this one with snot? Go bring yourself a pin of fine, beautiful water, put it here. Put a fingertip of salt in it, it will become snot’

Imperativ.text: The cat said, ‘Poor thing, whence will you fill this one with tears and this one with snot? Go bring yourself a pin of fine, beautiful water, put it here. Put a fingertip of salt in it, it will become snot’. (Tərto Zaré)
